AD_SweepingBroom.synopsis: Timothy the Gnoll is walking around the kitchen with a broom and tidying the kitchen under the control of Linsella, the Gnoll Master. She points out spots he is missing, training them.

AD_BackToWork.synopsis: The kitchen master is calling affectionate instructions to her scullions - a pack of half-tamed gnolls. Tone is sing-song and sweet.

AD_FoodPrepComment.synopsis: Tomelia the Gnoll is cooking a meal under the mind control of Linsella, the Gnoll Master. She provides some feedback and encouragement as the gnoll brings her food creation. Gnoll sounds are no VO, SFX only.

GnollAttack.synopsis: Upon killing the gnoll master through dialog or through gameplay, gnolls show threatening behavior and will flee as they are not under control anymore unless someone else is present in the room,

GnollMaster.synopsis: A True Soul oversees some gnolls in the kitchen. They're uncharacteristically quiet, and she explains that the Absolute has given her the ability to 'bring out the good' in then. In truth she is simply dominating them - she'll demonstrate by forcing the gnoll to perform tricks, but we can subvert her power and let the gnoll kill her.
GnollMaster.how_to_trigger: Speak to the female gnome in Moonrise's kitchens.

MasterGrieving_0.speaker: Linsella
MasterGrieving_0.text: Poor Barnabus. I'll have to find another favourite.
MasterGrieving_0.context: NodeContext: Genuinely sad. Her favourite 'pet' gnoll died.

AD_SweepingBroom_0.speaker: Linsella
AD_SweepingBroom_0.text: Clean up your mess, Timothy. That gnome was not for eating.

AD_SweepingBroom_2.speaker: Linsella
AD_SweepingBroom_2.text: Oh, my love. Did you think it was me? I'm a halfling, you great furry fool.
AD_SweepingBroom_2.context: NodeContext: Realizing that Timothy was actually trying to kill her when he ate a gnome. Not angry, just amused.

AD_SweepingBroom_5.speaker: Linsella
AD_SweepingBroom_5.text: And over there, Timothy! The mess you made last time we had to have a little talk, remember?

AD_SweepingBroom_3.speaker: Linsella
AD_SweepingBroom_3.text: Now, now. I can see your fangs, my dov. Don't make me show you mine.
AD_SweepingBroom_3.context: NodeContext: Chiding, with a hint of threat. She's forcing a wild animal to bend to her will and do chores, and he's growling at her

AD_BackToWork_0.speaker: Linsella
AD_BackToWork_0.text: You boys are very good with those cleavers. Something tells me you've had the practice, hm?

AD_BackToWork_1.speaker: Linsella
AD_BackToWork_1.text: See? Isn't it so much quieter when dinner is already dead?

AD_BackToWork_2.speaker: Linsella
AD_BackToWork_2.text: The Absolute has given you a second chance, loves. Don't waste it.

AD_BackToWork_3.speaker: Linsella
AD_BackToWork_3.text: Clean paws, my loves. We want no more crunchy surprises in the stew.

AD_FoodPrepComment_0.speaker: Linsella
AD_FoodPrepComment_0.text: Look at this! I've eaten worse at inns in my day. Perhaps we'll try it out on the ogre, hm?

AD_FoodPrepComment_4.speaker: Linsella
AD_FoodPrepComment_4.text: I still see some bone in there, my love - remember that we don't all have teeth as big as yours.

AD_FoodPrepComment_3.speaker: Linsella
AD_FoodPrepComment_3.text: Much better, Tomelia! A little bloody for our tastes, but you're getting there.

GnollAttack_10.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_10.text: *All trace of restraint is gone. 'Barnabus' has tasted blood, and wants more.*

GnollAttack_31.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_31.text: *To your surprise, instead of ravishing you, he grovels with a howl of pining awe.*
GnollAttack_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: The gnolls fall to their knees or prostrate themselves/show any other sign of submission (such as the bowing of the head used in N48)

GnollAttack_25.speaker: Player
GnollAttack_25.text: I'm back? Why have we met?

GnollAttack_17.speaker: 'Barnabus'
GnollAttack_17.context: NodeContext: Sounds like gnolls are frothing at the mouth.

GnollAttack_47.speaker: Player
GnollAttack_47.text: No need to wait any longer, gnollies, there's blood coming soon.

GnollAttack_4.speaker: Player
GnollAttack_4.text: You're all magnificent beasts... magnificent indeed.

GnollAttack_5.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_5.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

GnollAttack_28.speaker: Player
GnollAttack_28.text: Easy! I freed you - I'm a friend.

GnollAttack_48.speaker: 'Barnabus'
GnollAttack_48.context:
NodeContext: Barnabus moves as if ready to attack anyway, but hesitates - then delivers the line.
Struggling to speak - gnoll throats are not made for human sounds

GnollAttack_39.speaker: 'Barnabus'
GnollAttack_39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Throws head back to howl - will attack immediately after this.

GnollAttack_27.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_27.text: *The beast sizes you up... then turns away to easier prey - the kitchen's rich stock of unguarded meat and a warm patch by the fire.*
GnollAttack_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Barnabus cringes, then grudgingly takes a step back, looking off to the side.

GnollAttack_2.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_2.text: *As if following a well-worn path, your mind reaches out and knows where to squeeze.*

GnollAttack_36.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_36.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

GnollAttack_8.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_8.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

GnollAttack_6.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_6.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

GnollAttack_45.speaker: 'Barnabus'
GnollAttack_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Barnabus cringes and bows his head in submission.

GnollAttack_35.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_35.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

GnollAttack_41.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_41.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

GnollAttack_15.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_15.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

GnollAttack_23.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_23.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

GnollAttack_14.speaker: Player
GnollAttack_14.text: The creature thinks you prey - adjust your body language to display as a threat.

GnollAttack_40.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_40.text: *You focus on the source of the power, but it is quiet and still. It needs to rest.*

GnollAttack_33.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_33.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*
GnollAttack_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Symbol on NPC glowsInternalNodeContext: Delete if you are talking to a companion.

GnollAttack_34.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_34.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

GnollAttack_21.speaker: Narrator
GnollAttack_21.text: *A strange sensation courses through you, and your companion's mind unfolds, secrets half-revealed.*
GnollAttack_21.context: InternalNodeContext: Delete if you are talking to an NPC.

GnollMaster_23.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_23.text: Go on now, friend. It seems I must have a stern chat with Barnabus.
GnollMaster_23.context: NodeContext: Bad things lie ahead for Barnabus

GnollMaster_26.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mid-conversation with a gnoll, holds up hand to us as we approach

GnollMaster_24.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_24.text: You use a spoon to stir the soup, Barnabus. Forget the axe, my darling.
GnollMaster_24.context: NodeContext: Kindly - speaking to a favourite child that is none too bright

GnollMaster_4.speaker: 'Barnabus'
GnollMaster_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gnoll tilts its head and nods.NodeContext: Gnolls make hyena noises - this is a soft sound of acknowledgement/comprehension. Tilting its head and nodding.

GnollMaster_63.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_63.text: Now! How can I help you?
GnollMaster_63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Turns back to usNodeContext: Chipper, friendly

GnollMaster_34.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_34.text: I've shown Barnabus a kinder way. A kinder name is only fitting.

GnollMaster_53.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_53.text: That is the gift the Absolute gave me, when I stood before Her. To rewrite the lives of Her faithful - make them believe they are something better.
GnollMaster_53.context: NodeContext: Earnest, recounting a religious experience

GnollMaster_10.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_10.text: Gnolls are beasts, plain and simple.

GnollMaster_69.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_69.text: Oh, the good is buried deeper in some, that is true. But She will always find it.

GnollMaster_60.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_60.text: I thought the Absolute accepted us all as we are.

GnollMaster_50.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_50.text: She gathers many threads for Her Design - but it is still Her Design. And Barnabus has found his place in it. Observe:

GnollMaster_13.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_13.text: You've actually stood before the Absolute?

GnollMaster_32.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_32.text: I have. It is one thing to hear Her voice. Quite another to feel the power She can grant. Observe:

GnollMaster_39.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_39.text: Praise Her works - committed by the hands of Her faithful. Observe:

GnollMaster_8.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_8.text: Their will has always been Hers to command. I am simply putting it back where it belongs. Behold:

GnollMaster_64.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_64.text: Barnabus, sweetie! Come show what a good boy you are.
GnollMaster_64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind-meld effect / voice reverberation. The gnoll stands to rigid attention, enthralled.

GnollMaster_22.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_22.text: What would you like him to do?

GnollMaster_41.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_41.text: ...The prayer, I think. Barnabus struggles with civilised speech, but he's been practising.

GnollMaster_27.speaker: Narrator
GnollMaster_27.text: *You feel her will surge outwards and envelop the creature, inexorable as the tide.*

GnollMaster_21.speaker: 'Barnabus'
GnollMaster_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: in obvious pain at human speech

GnollMaster_57.speaker: 'Barnabus'
GnollMaster_57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gnoll pauses, shakes off the control for a brief momentNodeContext: Low growl as it comes back to its senses. Gnoll pauses, shakes off the control for a brief moment

GnollMaster_45.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_45.text: NO, Barnabus! We talked about this.
GnollMaster_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind-meld VFX flares again as she redoubles her effort, strainingNodeContext: Through gritted teeth, strained.

GnollMaster_25.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_25.text: Sever her control once and for all.

GnollMaster_66.speaker: Narrator
GnollMaster_66.text: *Like rope drawn taut beneath the blade, the connection simply... snaps.*

GnollMaster_6.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands up, ready to back awayNodeContext: Cautious, suddenly standing in front of a wild animal let loose from the leash. Last line is a shout as gnoll jumps on her.

GnollMaster_5.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_5.text: Put aside dreams of mincing her. Help her take back control.

GnollMaster_46.speaker: Narrator
GnollMaster_46.text: *The weight of the assault drives the gnoll to his knees, defiance melting away like snow in summer.*

GnollMaster_15.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_15.text: Hah. For all the power She lends us... I am still only an imperfect vessel.
GnollMaster_15.context: NodeContext: Panting, wry but relieved at a near miss

GnollMaster_11.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_11.text: Here. I meant this as a treat for Barnabus, but he doesn't deserve it now.

GnollMaster_68.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_68.text: You'll do well when you meet with the Absolute, I think.
GnollMaster_68.context: NodeContext: Appraising, seeing us with new eyes

GnollMaster_33.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_33.text: Hah. For all the power She lends us... I am still only an imperfect vessel. You will fare better when your time comes, I think.
GnollMaster_33.context: NodeContext: Panting, wry but relieved at a near miss

GnollMaster_19.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_19.text: Reinforce her efforts with your own.

GnollMaster_71.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_71.text: It seems you're not as commanding as you think.

GnollMaster_51.speaker: Narrator
GnollMaster_51.text: *They battle silently for a long moment, the gnoll's heart drumming with strain. Then all at once, his heart stops.*

GnollMaster_70.speaker: 'Barnabus'
GnollMaster_70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Barnabus keels over out of shot, dead.

GnollMaster_48.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_48.text: Oh, Barnabus. I'm so sorry, my darling.
GnollMaster_48.context: NodeContext: Disappointed and sad - but nothing to be done about it

GnollMaster_20.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_20.text: He isn't the first to die. Her love is simply too much for some. I hope you will fare better, when your time comes.

GnollMaster_0.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_0.text: How do I get to meet the Absolute?

GnollMaster_2.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_2.text: Please Z'rell, and you will be called to ascend to the tower-top. Many have gone before you.

GnollMaster_73.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_73.text: You almost make this audience sound dangerous.

GnollMaster_42.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_42.text: You ascend the tower as a True Soul, and return as something more.

GnollMaster_17.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_17.text: Aw - you'd like that, wouldn't you, Barnabus?

GnollMaster_62.speaker: 'Barnabus'
GnollMaster_62.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The gnoll begins a pathetic, shuffling dance on the spot. Think a wild bear forced to dance in the circus.

NodeContext: A soft hyena whine - The gnoll begins a pathetic, shuffling dance on the spot. Think a wild bear forced to dance in the circus.

GnollMaster_30.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_30.text: Nothing. Keep your sick games to yourself.

GnollMaster_16.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: She releases the gnoll from her thrall with a gesture

GnollMaster_31.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_31.text: A little advice - should you seek an audience with Her, steel yourself.

GnollMaster_52.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_52.text: To be remade, we must be willing to suffer.

GnollMaster_49.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_49.text: I've never seen a tame gnoll before.

GnollMaster_40.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_40.text: Soft and sweet as pudding, isn't he? He no longer remembers his life in the wild.

GnollMaster_44.speaker: Player
GnollMaster_44.text: This gift you mentioned. I'd like to see it after all.

GnollMaster_28.speaker: Linsella
GnollMaster_28.text: Yes? Barnabus and the boys get antsy if I'm distracted for too long.
